# This code was used manipulate data from the GenAlex R output into different program formats.

## Set working directory
```{r}
setwd("~/EEB_2016-2018/Peak tables")
```

## Formatting for Structure
```{r}
v1 <- read.table("GenAlex_1.25.18.csv", sep = ",")
names(v3) <- c("", "A103", "", "A115", "", "A120", "", "C1", "", "C6", "", "C105", "", "C125", "", "D4", "", "D10", "", "D106", "", "D113", "", "D114", "", "D119", "", "D125", "")
v2 <- v1[-c(1:3),]
v3 <- v2[,-c(2)]
write.csv(v3, "Structure.csv")
```
